publishedfiledetails.title: Prometheus(Newest Version)
publishedfiledetails.description:
Mod ID: [b]1840936777[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/fVVaDCS.gif[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/ithffHS.png[/img]

This is a large integrated mod, with many new items and creatures.
English is the only language of this mod without exception.
This Mod is free to use and you don't have to pay anything for it. If you need the mod source files(may not be free), please contact me.


[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198833299762/myworkshopfiles/] [img]https://i.imgur.com/ERZQ9uw.png[/img]
My Other Mods here![/url]


Have fun & enjoy the mod. Thank you for all your support & God bless you!

This mod/code/work is protected by the [url=https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/legalcode]Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International Creative Commons License.[/url]
